main event: On April 22, 1966, five civilians observed a bright red spherical object in the sky near Akron, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 10 minutes under cloudy and rainy conditions., One observer compared the object to a commercial airliner., The object was bright and spherical, viewed through fog and light rain., Witnesses reported seeing the object moving from southeast to northwest., The sighting occurred near Akron-Canton Airport amidst other reports of UFO sightings around the same time.
